description: Delhi High Court refuses to intervene in tax recovery proceedings against Congress. ITAT rejects allegations of motivated action. Congress is allowed to approach ITAT for a stay on tax recovery. The court notes that Congress failed to take protective measures against the tax demand in assessment year 2018-19.
title: No HC relief for Cong in tax recovery proceedings

description: On a day when the sensex recorded the second biggest loss in market capitalisation, Adani stocks witnessed the group's biggest single-session wealth erosion of Rs 1.1 lakh crore last seen on Feb 2, 2023, a week after the US-based short-seller Hindenburg published its report on the conglomerate.
title: Adani stocks lose over Rs 1 lakh crore in a day

description: Sri Lankan authorities detained 21 Indian nationals for illegally operating a computer-operated business in Negombo. They will be deported after preliminary inquiry and investigations. After a preliminary inquiry, the department raided a rented house in the popular western coast resort town of Negombo, where those arrested were found operating a computer-operated business.
title: 21 Indians held for working illegally on tourist visa in Sri Lanka

description: Russia is pivoting away from European markets due to trade restrictions, building ties with China and India. The North-South Transport Corridor railway project aims to boost trade with Mumbai and Persian Gulf countries. That southern route has now become a focus of Russian policymakers as they try to build infrastructure for their plans to pivot away from the West for good. The effort faces challenges, including questions over financing, doubts over the reliability of Russia's new partners, and threats of Western sanctions targeting countries that trade with Russia.
title: From Moscow to Mumbai: Russia Pivots South for Trade

description: Joe Biden and Donald Trump secure their parties' presidential nominations, setting the stage for a general election rematch in Nov. Biden faced minimal opposition in the Democratic primary, while Trump cleared the field of major Republican rivals with a victory in Iowa. Biden faced only token opposition in the Democratic primary, as is typical for a sitting president, while Trump had been his party's dominant frontrunner for months.
title: It's Trump vs Biden again, first US election rematch in 68 years

description: Wednesday was the worst day for Dalal Street investors since Covid in terms of wealth erosion. The day's selloff erased Rs 13.9 lakh crore worth of investors' wealth in terms of loss in BSE's market capitalisation that was just a tad lower than the Rs 14.2 lakh crore, the biggest loss ever.
title: Sensex plunges, investors lose Rs 14 lakh crore

description: The Supreme Court acquitted a male school teacher accused of sexual harassment. The court emphasized the stringent provisions of the Pocso Act, the importance of protecting a teacher's reputation, and the far-reaching consequences of sexual harassment on girl students. A bench of Justices Dipankar Datta, K V Vishwanathan and Sandeep Mehta found that the evidence given by the allegedly harassed minor student and witnesses was full of discrepancies and reversed concurrent findings of a Tamil Nadu trial court and Madras high court, by which the teacher was sentenced to three years imprisonment.
title: Teacher forcing girl to accept flowers is sexual harassment: SC
SCBA slams its chief for writing to President on electoral bonds

description: BJP and LJP have settled for a seat-sharing arrangement in Bihar. Chirag Paswan-led LJP will get five seats, including Hajipur. The arrangement may affect Pashupati Kumar Paras. Chirag will ally with Nitish Kumar. NDA is confident about winning all Bihar Lok Sabha seats. ​​It will also mean that Chirag, who once acted in a Hindi movie, will be part of an alliance with sworn enemy Nitish Kumar, who recently parted ways with RJD and Congress to return to the NDA-fold.
title: In deal with BJP, Chirag Paswan gets 5 Bihar seats

description: Live-in partners are bound by provisions of UP's 2021 anti-conversion law as much as legally married interfaith couples, Allahabad HC said while declaring a pair that got married through Arya Samaj rituals as a 'live-in couple' and ordering them to go through established registration procedure.State, too, opposed the plea, saying they never applied for religious conversion.
title: UP anti-conversion law applies to live-in couples too, says HC

description: Tigress ST-12 and her three cubs have been sighted at Sariska Tiger Reserve, marking her third litter. The reserve now has 33 big cats, including 11 males, 14 females, and eight cubs, demonstrating positive wildlife conservation efforts in the region. Tigress ST-12, 10-year-old, was captured on camera in the Talvrikash forest range alongside her three cubs, estimated to be around three months old. This marks the third litter for the tigress who had previously given birth to six cubs.
title: Good news from Sariska: ST-12 spotted with 3 cubs
Mizoram cuts MLAs' perks, to save Rs 13 crore

description: Rahul Gandhi announced 'Mahila Nyay' guarantees in Maharashtra's Dhule, including direct benefit transfer of Rs 1 lakh to underprivileged women and 50% reservation in govt jobs. Congress also promised doubling govt contributions to income of Anganwadi, ASHA, and midday meal workers. They will establish hostels for working women and appoint nodal officers in every district.
title: Rahul’s poll pledge: 1L/yr in a/cs of poor women
NCC strength to go up to 20 lakh
Uttarakhand UCC bill gets President nod

description: The committee on 'One Nation One Election', led by Ram Nath Kovind, has finalised its report and is expected to recommend simultaneous parliamentary, assembly, and local bodies polls to save the economy from disruptions caused by frequent elections. The report suggests standardising electoral rolls, amending laws and Constitution, and submitting recommendations to President Droupadi Murmu.
title: Panel likely to back ‘1 nation, 1 poll’, may give report today
SC may hear plea on EC appointment on Friday

description: State Bank of India has provided detailed information on 22,217 electoral bonds to the Election Commission. Uncashed amounts have been transferred to PM's National Relief Fund. The bank recorded the purchase and redemption details of the EBs, including the names of purchasers, denomination of EBs, date of redemption, and names of political parties.
title: Have given poll bond data to EC in 2 silos, SBI chief tells SC
CJI praises SC cook's daughter as she gets offers from US law schools

description: PM Modi lays the foundation stone for three semiconductor plants worth Rs 1.25 crore, aiming for self-reliance and global power. India seeks to play a crucial role due to disruptions caused by the pandemic, while maintaining democracy. The plants will be located in Dholera, Sanand, and Morigaon, contributing to Industry 4.0 and benefiting the youth.
title: ‘Democracy delivers’: PM lays stone of 3 semiconductor plants
CAA violative of Assam Accord: Congress

description: Nitin Gadkari, Piyush Goyal, Pralhad Joshi, Anurag Thakur, Rao Inderjit Singh, Manohar Lal Khattar, and Trivendra Singh Rawat are among the prominent names in the second list of BJP's candidates for Lok Sabha polls. ​Sadananda Gowda, former Karnataka CM and ex-Union minister, has been replaced by Union minister of state Shobha Karandlaje in Bangalore North. Former Karnataka BJP chief Nalin Kumar Kateel has been benched in Dakshin Kannada in favour of Brijesh Chouta.
title: In BJP's second national list of 72, over 50% MPs lose seat
Cong's-time Kanpur MLA Ajay Kapoor defects to BJP
In 2-1 ruling, Bombay HC quashes petitions to restrain govt from notifying FCU
Didi disowns 'greedy' brother after he revolts against TMC nominee

description: After posting 'frequently asked questions' on the citizenship portal - indiancitizenshiponline.nic.in - to break down Citizenship (Amendment) Rules, 2024 for prospective applicants in simple language, home ministry on Wednesday announced the launch of a helpline to guide them through the application process. "Helpline number to assist applicants of Indian citizenship under #CAA-2019 is being started soon."
title: After portal, MHA to launch helpline for CAA applicants

description: JJP's chief indirectly benefited BJP by asking his 10 MLAs to absent themselves from proceedings, allowing BJP to easily sail through the floor test with its own 41 MLAs. The backing of seven other members - six Independents and Gopal Kanda of Haryana Lokhit Party (HLP) - came as additional support for BJP.
title: Newly appointed CM Saini wins Haryana assembly trust motion

description: The Russian leader has repeatedly talked about his readiness to use nuclear weapons since launching a full-scale invasion of Ukraine on Feb. 24, 2022. The most recent such threat came in his state-of-the-nation address last month, when he warned the West that deepening its involvement in the fighting in Ukraine would risk a nuclear war.
title: Putin warns West: Russia ready for nuke war if sovereignty threatened
House passes Bill to force TikTok sale from Chinese owner or ban the app
Don’t fall into anti-CAA protest trap, vote against BJP: Mehbooba

description: Adil Khan and Somi Khan had a low-key nikah ceremony. Adil criticized Rakhi Sawant for spreading negativity and emphasized his desire to leave behind his past with her. He mentioned a court case, his right to marry again, and their reception. Reacting to his past with Rakhi Sawant, Adil Khan stated that Rakhi can never keep anyone happy.
title: Adil Khan: My first wedding with Rakhi Sawant stands null and void

description: Bhutan PM's visit to India amid efforts by India and China to strengthen ties. Preparations for PM Modi's visit to Bhutan. China reaches out to resolve border issue with Bhutan. Bhutan cautious about military road before resolving border dispute with China. India-Bhutan ties reviewed and expanded.
title: As China looms, India steps up Bhutan outreach
SOORYA: Project team for rocket to build space station ready
Jeff Yass: The billionaire caught in TikTok-Washington crossfire

description: India's HPCA stadium in Dharamsala hosted the final Test match against England, known for its scenic beauty. Wasim Akram highlighted the lack of picturesque stadiums in Pakistan. India won the series, with Ashwin achieving a five-wicket haul in his 100th Test. India secured a dominant victory, clinching the series 4-1.
title: Pak can only dream of making a stadium like Dharamsala: Akram

description: Russian President Putin reiterated readiness to use nuclear weapons to protect sovereignty. He emphasized the need for a serious discussion with NATO allies and Ukraine. Putin mentioned efforts to disrupt Russia's presidential election and condemned Ukrainian attacks inside Russia.
title: 'Russia ready to use nuclear weapon if ...': Putin warns again
Why Chirag Paswan thanked PM Modi for 'protecting him'
'Political gimmick': Oppn raises pitch against CAA; BJP hits back says 'stop spreading lies'

description: Harbhajan Singh, former India spinner, suggests that star batsman Virat Kohli maintains a strong desire to secure another World Cup victory, despite having missed out on the prestigious title three times before. Virat, absent from India's recently concluded five-match series against England, which India won 4-1, made his World Cup debut in 2011, where he played a pivotal role in clinching the trophy, ending India's 28-year wait for the coveted prize.
title: Harbhajan's massive comment on Virat Kohli's World Cup 'luck'

description: Former South African cricketer AB de Villiers compared Chennai Super Kings (CSK) skipper MS Dhoni to a diesel engine that never stops working.  Speculations swirled around Dhoni's retirement after the 2023 IPL season, with murmurs suggesting it might mark the swansong of his illustrious career. Yet, fueled by an unwavering commitment to his franchise, the Chennai Super Kings (CSK), Dhoni vowed to grace the cricketing stage for one more season, despite grappling with a significant knee injury.
title: 'This diesel engine never...': ABD on CSK captain Dhoni

description: The US House of Representatives passed a bill to ban TikTok unless it separates from its Chinese parent company in six months. The bill needs Senate approval. President Biden will sign it into law. The US cites national security concerns. TikTok denies storing US user information in China. Resistance comes from TikTok users, Trump, and Musk.
title: US House passes bill that will ban TikTok unless it meets condition

description: Himachal Pradesh Chief Minister Sukhwinder Singh Sukhu claimed that the six rebel MLAs who had cross-voted in the Rajya Sabha polls are now regretting their actions. This political crisis had pushed the Sukhu government to the brink, but the Congress high command managed to prevent any further fallout. The MLAs are being accused of backstabbing the Congress and compromising their principles.
title: 'Rebel MLAs regretting back-stabbing Congress', CM Sukhu says

description: Deepinder Goyal, the entrepreneur and shark in Shark Tank India 3, opens up about his stammering issue, mental preparation, and how it affects his public appearances. He discusses techniques like speaking slowly and conscious avoidance of syllables, as well as the physical manifestation of falling sick before events. Take a look:
title: Shark Tank 3: Deepinder Goyal speaks on dealing with stammering
US House passes bill to ban TikTok

description: Vodafone Idea (Vi) is late in 5G rollout. Vi completed 5G minimum rollout obligation. It has 90% 5G-ready TDD radios and all new basebands are 5G-capable. Vi aims to launch 5G services in six to seven months.
title: Vodafone-Idea gives update on 5G plans

description: Following his survival of a life-threatening accident, Rishabh Pant harbored unwavering confidence in his ability to return to top-flight cricket. Even if achieving this required a miracle, he was resolute in his belief that he could make it happen. While his treating doctor, the esteemed orthopedic surgeon Dinshaw Pardiwala, was not as optimistic, Pant dispelled any concerns by categorizing himself as a "miracle man."
title: Why Rishabh Pant called himself a 'miracle man'

description: Indian stock markets have experienced significant declines, with small and mid-cap stock indices plummeting over 4%, and the main S&P BSE Sensex Index falling 1.2%, eliminating gains made earlier in the month. The downturn affected nearly all 1,139 members of the S&P BSE AllCap Index. Specifically, the S&P BSE Small Cap Index saw a reduction in market value exceeding $40 billion in less than two weeks.
title: Smallcap selloff brings worst day for Indian stocks in two years

description: BJP releases second list of 72 candidates for Lok Sabha elections. Nitin Gadkari to contest from Nagpur, Piyush Goyal from Mumbai North, and Pankaja Munde from Beed. (Developing story)
title: Union minister Piyush Goyal set to make Lok Sabha poll debut
BJP releases second list of candidates for Lok Sabha polls; Gadkari to contest from Nagpur

description: In the upcoming 2024 season of the Indian Premier League (IPL), Hardik Pandya is poised to take the helm for Mumbai Indians, stepping into the shoes of their five-time trophy-winning captain, Rohit Sharma. Last November, Pandya made a return to Mumbai Indians from Gujarat Titans (GT), his former team, as part of a trade agreement between the franchises. The dynamic all-rounder had two significant years with Gujarat Titans, notably guiding them to their inaugural title victory in their debut season in 2022.
title: 'Big controversy..': ABD on Hardik replacing Rohit as MI captain

description: Munmun Dutta and Raj Anadkat from TMKOC denied rumors of a secret engagement. They exchanged rings in Vadodara and have been dating since Raj joined the show. Munmun called the news ridiculous and fake, while Raj asked people to stop spreading false stories about him.
title: TMKOC’s Munmun Dutta and Raj Anadkat engaged? Actress reacts

description: Elon Musk opposes the TikTok ban, expressing concerns about government censorship and control. He warns against potential restrictions on online platforms and the infringement on free speech. The debate over government regulation and censorship on social media platforms remains ongoing.
title: Here's what Elon Musk has to say on TikTok being banned in US

description: This is the second billion dollar auto investment that TN has attracted in the last two months after Vietnam-based VinFast announced a Rs 16,000 crore investment in the state.
title: Tata Motors to open ‘cutting-edge’ vehicle manufacturing in TN

description: A 20-year-old student at a government-run residential hostel in Bijapur district gave birth to a child. The incident raises concerns over the safety of girls in residential schools as cases of molestation, rape, and sexual assault continue to surface.
title: Class 12 student gives birth to a child in govt-run boarding school

description: A dogged fightback from Vidarbha, led by Karun Nair (74) and skipper Akshay Wadkar (56 not out), prolonged Mumbai's wait for a 42nd Ranji Trophy title as the visiting side reached 248/5 in pursuit of a mammoth 538 on the fourth and penultimate day of the final in Mumbai on Wednesday. Set an improbable target to win the summit clash after being outplayed since the first day afternoon, Vidarbha put up a resolute show with the bat to frustrate their hosts by resorting to stonewalling for the majority of the day.
title: Vidarbha prolong Mumbai's wait for 42nd Ranji triumph

description: Chief Election Commissioner Rajiv Kumar has assured peaceful elections in Jammu and Kashmir and strict vigil on online cash transfers.  "People above 85 years and those with disability will be provided voting at home facility in Jammu and Kashmir," he said. A team of Election Commission officials led by CEC reviewed poll preparedness in the Union territory ahead of Lok Sabha elections.
title: Lok Sabha elections: What CEC said on polls in Jammu and Kashmir
Details on electoral bonds will be disclosed on time: CEC

description: Doordarshan will telecast live the Mangala, Shringaar, Rajbhog, Sandhya, and Shayan Aartis offered to the Ram Lalla idol at the Ayodhya Ram temple on DD National, connecting devotees who can't visit the temple.
title: You can now watch Ayodhya Ram Mandir morning Aarti live daily

description: India strengthened their position at the forefront of the World Test Championship (WTC) rankings with a commanding innings and 64-run victory in Dharamsala, clinching a convincing 4-1 series triumph over England. This remarkable win elevated India's percentage points from 64.58 to 68.51, accumulated over nine matches in the ongoing WTC cycle. Their record comprises six victories, two losses, and one draw.
title: Yuvraj trolls Shubman in Rohit's 'garden mein ghoomne' post

description: Bumble's new CEO, Lidiane Jones, plans a major overhaul for female-focused dating app, Bumble, founded by Whitney Wolfe Herd. The relaunch in Q2 2024 will test new ways for users to connect, including men messaging first and using 'Compliments' with pre-written greetings. Users have mixed opinions about the change.
title: How the Bumble may be changing forever
Saini govt wins trust vote in Haryana; Khattar resigns as MLA

description: His stitches removed after a surgery to fix an injured ankle, senior India pacer Mohammed Shami on Wednesday said he was looking forward to the next phase of his "healing journey". The pacer, who took 24 wickets in the 2023 ODI World Cup, missed the five-match Test series against England recently and will also sit out of the IPL after having undergone surgery for an ankle injury last month.
title: Looking forward to next stage of my healing journey: Shami

description: The Financial Stability and Development Council (FSDC) has proposed a uniform KYC system to simplify the process of submitting KYC details. The system aims to make KYC records easily shareable and promote digitalisation while addressing privacy and security concerns. Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman plans to adopt a risk-based approach for KYC.
title: What is uniform KYC? Here’s what can change for customers
CAA: Centre to issue helpline numbers to assist applicants

description: Zepto, the quick-commerce company, charges a platform fee and a late night handling fee. Competitors Zomato's Blinkit and Swiggy Instamart also charge platform fees. Zepto focuses on core operating efficiency, has a market share of about 20%, and offers the Zepto Pass loyalty programme. The membership is priced at Rs 299 per month.
title: Zepto introduces platform fee of Rs 2: Read company statement

description: Cognition AI's Devin, an AI chatbot backed by Peter Thiel's Founders Fund, handles entire development projects independently, including code suggestions, autocomplete tasks, fixing bugs, publishing websites, and testing code. It shows exceptional coding performance and has limited access. Investors include Peter Thiel.
title: New AI chatbot named Devin ‘bad news’ for software developers

description: HDFC Bank introduces mobile number verification for its banking app, requiring users to update the app and use the registered mobile number and SIM card associated with the bank's account number for access. To use the app, users must have an active SMS subscription and provide their Debit Card details or NetBanking password for authentication.
title: HDFC Bank users, the bank’s app will not work till you do this
'I have decided to disown him': Mamata hits out at brother

description: The National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) has advised Paytm FASTag users to get a new FASTag from another bank before March 15 to ensure a seamless travel experience and avoid penalties. Paytm FASTag users will no longer be able to recharge or top-up their balance after March 15, 2024, in line with RBI guidelines.
title: Paytm FASTag users alert! NHAI has urgent advisory
Union cabinet approves 2 more Delhi Metro corridors

description: BJP releases list of candidates for Arunachal Pradesh assembly elections. Pema Khandu contesting from Mukto constituency. Biyuram Wahge from Pakke Kessang. NCP also releases list with Likha Saaya as a candidate. BJP won 41 seats in 2019 assembly elections.
title: BJP releases list of candidates on all 60 seats in Arunachal
Former Haryana CM Manohar Lal Khattar resigns as BJP MLA

description: Indian off-spinner Ravichandran Ashwin made a significant impact in his 100th Test match, earning the top spot in the ICC bowlers' rankings. Ashwin's performance in the Dharamsala Test against England saw him take nine crucial wickets, including four scalps in the first innings and a five-wicket haul in the second innings.
title: Ashwin replaces Bumrah at top of Test rankings; Rohit rises to 6th

description: A woman clinging to a car door in Uttar Pradesh sparked concerns about whether it was a planned stunt or a safety issue. The incident's location near Phoenix Palassio Mall raised further questions. The response of Lucknow Police ensured intervention and appropriate measures through an inquiry.
title: On cam, UP woman caught clinging to moving car's door

description: Virat Kohli has been backed by fans following speculation about his inclusion in the upcoming T20 World Cup squad. Fans have shared videos of his iconic six against Pakistan's Haris Rauf during the tournament, hailed as the'shot of the century'. This momentous performance showcases Kohli's exceptional skill and nerve in high-pressure situations.
title: Watch: 'Shot of the century' goes viral as fans rally behind Kohli
Bhojpuri singer Pawan Singh takes U-turn, says will contest polls

description: A viral video of a woman squeezing herself between men in a packed compartment of the Delhi Metro has sparked outrage, highlighting the need for gender-neutral laws and a gender-neutral approach by the police.
title: Denied seat in Delhi Metro, woman squeezes between men onboard
UP CM Yogi highlights state's progress under BJP govt

description: Venkataramana Pittala, a master's student in health informatics at Indiana University Purdue University Indianapolis(IUPUI) and hailing from Kazipet, Telangana, died in a jet ski mishap at the Fury playground near Wisteria Island in Florida on March 9. A collision between two jet skis resulted in his untimely death, while a 14-year-old boy escaped without injuries.
title: Telangana student dies in jet ski mishap in Florida

description: President Droupadi Murmu approves the Uniform Civil Code Uttarakhand Bill, 2024, making Uttarakhand the first state in India to implement the UCC Act. The bill addresses practices like polygamy, polyandry, halala, iddat, and talaaq, and ensures property rights, equal marriageable age, and equal inheritance rights.
title: Prez gives approval, U'khand to become 1st state to have UCC

description: Since the BCCI officially announced Rishabh Pant's complete fitness for competitive cricket, excitement surrounding the wicketkeeper-batsman's highly anticipated comeback has reached new heights. Adding to the fervor, Delhi Capitals devised a charming method to present Pant with his team jersey ahead of the coming IPL 2024 season.
title: Watch: Rishabh Pant gets his DC jersey in a 'cute' manner

description: Vande Bharat Express is a semi-high speed train service with all air-conditioned chair car coaches. It was first launched in 2019 and has increasingly emerged as the face of new age world-class premium travel on the Indian Railways network.
title: How Vande Bharat impressed Truecaller exec during trip to India

description: According to the affidavit, SBI has furnished information including the date of purchase, names of the purchasers, and denominations of the electoral bonds. The national bank disclosed to the Supreme Court that a total of 22,217 electoral bonds were purchased between April 1, 2019, and February 15, 2024. Electoral bonds have been a subject of intense debate and scrutiny, as they are used by individuals and corporations to anonymously donate money to political parties.
title: 22k+ electoral bonds purchased from 2019-2024: SBI

description: Having recovered from a car accident, Rishabh Pant is making a comeback to competitive cricket in IPL 2024. Returning to play for the Delhi Capitals, the team's season opener will be held at the newly-built Punjab Cricket Association stadium in Mullanpur on March 23. Pant was officially declared fully fit by the BCCI on Monday.
title: Rishabh Pant: 'Recovery phase was like building a Test innings'

description: Former Pakistan cricketer Danish Kaneria has dismissed reports suggesting Indian cricketer Virat Kohli may be excluded from the upcoming T20 World Cup squad. Speculation surrounds the national selectors and team management's readiness for tough decisions. Kaneria argued that social media should not be taken seriously as it can be viral.
title: 'How can you ignore him?': Ex-Pak player on Kohli's T20 WC chance

description: Anil Naik's management style was characterized by being tough yet respectful. Despite the conflicts in the L&T boardroom, he never lost his cool and always remained gentle with his opponents.
title: How AM Naik saved L&T from takeover attempt by Ambani & Birla group

description: Delhi remains India's most vehicle theft-prone city, with thefts increasing by 2.5x since 2022. Chennai, Bengaluru, Hyderabad, Mumbai, and Kolkata also reported thefts. Hotspots include Bhajanpura, Uttam Nagar, Shahdara, Patparganj, and Badarpur. Popular targets are Maruti Suzuki, Hero Splendor, Honda Activa, and Royal Enfield Classic 350.
title: One vehicle stolen every 14 mins in Delhi-NCR

description: Stock market today: BSE Sensex and Nifty50, the Indian benchmark stock indices, tanked in trade on Wednesday driven by selling pressure in RIL shares and utilities, as global stocks also saw a downturn, exerting further pressure on the indices.
title: Stock market today: Sensex plunges 600 pts; Nifty50 below 22k
PM congratulates Indians at foundation laying ceremony of 3 chip plants

description: Google Messages introduces Emoji Reaction Effects, bringing animated reactions to conversations. Currently available for Android. Recipients may experience varying effects based on compatibility and emoji selection.
title: Google Messages gets emoji reaction effects: What is it & more

description: The Ram Janmabhoomi Mandir in Ayodhya, Uttar Pradesh, attracts thousands of devotees daily. The temple trust has made entry and exit convenient, ensuring a smooth darshan of Prabhu Shri Ram Lalla Sarkar within 60 to 75 minutes. Visitors are advised to leave personal items outside and avoid bringing flowers, garlands, and prasad. Entry passes for different Aartis can be obtained free of charge from the temple trust's website. The temple does not offer 'special darshan' for a fee. Wheelchair service is available exclusively within the temple premises for a nominal fee.
title: Ram Mandir attracting 1 to 1.5L pilgrims daily: Temple trust

description: Unidentified women allegedly attacked a Jubilee Hills BRS corporator on a road in Telangana, police said on Wednesday.
title: Watch: Women attack BRS corporator in Hyd's Jubilee Hills

description: The Supreme Court will urgently hear a plea from an NGO challenging the validity of the provision in the Chief Election Commissioner and Other Election Commissioners Act 2023. The plea questions the exclusion of the Chief Justice of India from the panel responsible for selecting the Chief Election Commissioner and other election commissioners.
title: EC appointment: Supreme Court to hear plea on Friday

description: As the Indian Premier League season approaches, various events are happening across all franchises, including team building exercises and practice sessions, but some players will miss the season due to various reasons.
title: IPL: List of injured, unavailable players and their replacements

description: On Wednesday, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal slammed the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) for implementing the Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) before of the Lok Sabha elections. "While other countries build walls and fences to prevent illegal migrants from entering their country, BJP is the only party to open the nation's doors for the poor from neighbouring countries," Kejriwal said terming the move 'dangerous'.
title: CAA implementation ahead of LS polls BJP's 'dirty politics': Kejri

description: Bengaluru cafe blast suspect has been arrested by the NIA as per TV reports. The individual, identified as Shabbir, was apprehended in Ballari, Karnataka. The blast at Rameshwaram cafe in Whitefield on March 1 left at least nine injured. Following an order from MHA, NIA took over the case last week. The agency has released several visuals of the suspect's bus travels in recent days.
title: Bengaluru café blast case suspect detained by NIA

description: The NIA denied arresting the key suspect in the Bengaluru Cafe blast case. The blast occurred at the Whitefield eatery Rameshwaram Cafe, injuring nine people. The suspect was spotted in visuals released by the NIA, travelling in various buses. He is suspected to have travelled from Ballari to Pune by taking a bus heading for Gokarna in Karnataka.
title: NIA denies arresting Bengaluru's Rameshwaram Cafe blast case suspect
UP CM Yogi Adityanath distributes Rs 30,826 crore loan to MSME sector
Google Israel MD's response to the engineer who shouted at him

description: A privately developed rocket, Kairos, exploded midair shortly after takeoff in Japan. The incident was captured on a livestreamed video, showing flames and smoke engulfing the area. Efforts were made to extinguish the blaze. The Tokyo-based startup, Space One, responsible for the launch, has not commented yet. This launch had been delayed multiple times. No injuries or damage reported.
title: Japan's 1st privately developed rocket explodes after takeoff

description: Former Pakistan fast bowler Mohammad Irfan has defended Virat Kohli amid speculation over his place in the upcoming T20 World Cup squad. Reports suggest selectors are deliberating Kohli's inclusion in the T20I setup, raising doubts about his role in the tournament. Kohli recently returned to India's T20 squad after a 14-month hiatus, featuring in the Afghanistan series.
title: 'Can't form a team without Kohli': Ex-Pak cricketer slams critics

description: The incident unfolded on Tuesday evening when TDP candidate Chadalavada Aravinda Babu and party members were touring the wards.
title: Several injured as TDP, YSRCP workers clash in Andhra Pradesh

description: "I had to be on this journey alone," says Rishabh Pant of the last 14 months. In his first newspaper interview  after he was declared fit to return to action by the  BCCI on Tuesday, the talismanic youngster looked  back at the horrific car crash at the fag end of 2022, and  his long, lonely recovery and rehabilitation that ensued.
title: Exclusive: 'Doctors spoke to me about amputation' - Pant

description: IBM announces substantial job cuts in its marketing and communications division. CEO Arvind Krishna emphasized the company's commitment to upskilling its workforce in AI. The tech industry has witnessed downsizing, with approximately 204 tech companies collectively cutting nearly 50,000 jobs.
title: IBM set to cut more jobs in these two divisions

description: The Pentagon's withdrawal of $2.5 billion funding for Intel's chip production under the Chips Act hinders the US government's plan. The fate of Intel's Secure Enclave remains uncertain. Other chipmakers worry about reduced funding for their projects due to prioritizing Intel's military chip production.
title: No intel 'inside' as US backs out of multi-billion dollar deal

description: Apart from Jamtara and Mewat, cybercrime hubs have emerged in Bharatpur, Mathura, Gopalganj, Dhanbad, Dumka, Kulti, Deoghar, Gurugram, Alwar, Bokaro, Karma Tand, Giridih, and Nuh. Proximity to urban centers, lack of cyber awareness, and limited cyber security infrastructure contribute to the rise of cybercrime.
title: Jamtara & beyond: Cyber fraud hubs sprout in North India towns

description: Google restricts election-related queries for Gemini AI during India's General Election. The company works with a consortium of news publishers and fact checkers to detect and counter misinformation, including deepfakes, using advanced fact-checking methodologies and tools. They aim to safeguard platforms from abuse and help people navigate AI-generated content.
title: Google puts Gemini AI on silent mode for election related questions

description: Apple is reportedly planning to introduce a cheaper ad-supported tier for Apple TV+. Recent hires, including ad executive Joseph Cady, indicate this move. Apple's advertising team has been expanded, and the platform already features advertising in sports content. This follows Netflix's pricing strategy with ad-supported plans.
title: After Netflix & Amazon, Apple TV+ may get cheaper plan with ads
Modi is going to be PM again, is highly popular: US Congressman
